instruction: Generate a summary of the descriptive statistics for the treatment and control group of serial entrepreneurs.
output: The descriptive statistics for the treatment and control group of serial entrepreneurs show that the treatment group has a higher average age within the household, is less likely to live in Taipei, and is less likely to be employed. The treatment group also has lower household earnings and income, but higher household wealth and liquidity assets. The lottery variables show that the treatment group has a higher average amount of lottery prize and is more likely to have won a lottery prize. The outcomes variables show that the treatment group is more likely to own a business one year before the lottery win and two years before the lottery win.
